sentences.english: The effect of vanadium in cast iron and V - containing cast irons was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍钒在铸铁中的作用及含钒铸铁材料。

sentences.english: The effect of vanadium in cast iron and V - containing cast irons was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍钒在铸铁中的作用及含钒铸铁材料。

sentences.english: Some methods of retained austenite measurement on high chromium cast iron were compared.
sentences.chinese: 对高铬铸铁残余奥氏体测定的几种方法进行了比较。

sentences.english: Eutectic composition should be adopted for high-Cr white cast iron used under high-stress impact abrasion condition.
sentences.chinese: 高应力冲击磨料磨损时，高铬白口铸铁应选共晶成分。

sentences.english: Heating plate cast-1 ron, surface grinded and chrome-plated treatment.
sentences.chinese: 铸铁制品表面经研磨和镀铬处理。

sentences.english: Payne's gray in thin amounts cast a shadow onto the water.
sentences.chinese: 佩恩在薄数额的灰口铸铁到水的影子。

sentences.english: The mechanism of the effect of titanium on structure and properties of gray iron was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 对钛对灰铸铁组织和性能作用的机理提出了看法。

sentences.english: PW-type pump for the cast iron medium temperature does not exceed 80 ℃.
sentences.chinese: PW型泵体为铸铁材质介质温度不超过80℃。

sentences.english: The rolls are made of chilled alloy cast iron with wear-resistant hard surface.
sentences.chinese: 该卷制成的冷冻合金铸铁与耐磨材料坚硬表面。

sentences.english: The influence of SG inoculant on graphitizing annealing of malleable cast iron was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了SG变质剂对可锻铸铁石墨化退火的影响。

sentences.english: Connection rod and crass head is alloy-casting pieces.
sentences.chinese: 连杆为合金钢铸件，十字头为球墨铸铁。

sentences.english: The casting technique of cylinder liner used for G32 model heavy diesel engine was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍G32重型柴油机合金灰铸铁缸套的生产技术。

sentences.english: The effect of heating temperature on abrasion resistance of high alloy wear-resistant cast iron was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了加热温度对高合金耐磨铸铁耐磨性的影响。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, heat remaining 1 tablespoon olive oil in the heart cocotte over medium heat.
sentences.chinese: 同时，用中火和桃心铸铁锅加热另外一汤勺橄榄油。

sentences.english: This paper is a companion volume of "The wear failure analysis of phosphorus cast iron cylinder".
sentences.chinese: 本文是“高磷铸铁汽缸套磨损失效分析”的姊妹篇。

sentences.english: Much of the cast-iron was recast and replaced.
sentences.chinese: 建筑中许多铸铁构件经重新铸造得以更换。

definition: made of steel/steel (bar, screw, product etc)
copper (pure copper, as opposed to alloy)
brass (alloy of copper 銅|铜[tong2] and zinc 鋅|锌[xin1])
steel (as raw material)/steel sheets, bars, tubes, ingots, wire etc
